Package com.sololevelingreawakening.architectsystem

Class Stat

java.lang.Object
com.sololevelingreawakening.architectsystem.Stat
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Items, Player
public abstract class Stat extends Object
Represents the statistics of player/enemies in the game.
Author:
Arjunraj Masmela.
